Motorcyclists who do not wear helmets are at risk of suffering head injuries, brain damage, and even death if they are involved in a crash. Without a helmet, riders are also more likely to be thrown from their motorcycles, which can result in serious injuries. Additionally, riders who do not wear helmets may be more likely to be cited for traffic violations.
